Sometimes transplanted cell make immune response body 's normal tissue . Stem cell treat laboratory remove lymphocyte may prevent happen . DOC.brief_title: Prevention Graft-Versus-Host Disease Patients Undergoing Bone Marrow Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine whether stem cell augment , elutriated grafts prevent graft versus host disease patient undergo allogeneic bone marrow transplantation . OUTLINE : Patients receive elutriated CD34+ augment donor bone marrow day 0 . Bone marrow sample obtain day 100 , around 6 month , 1 year transplant . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Not specify
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm diagnosis one following : Acute myelogenous leukemia CR1 , ER1 , CR2 , ER2 , CR3 Acute lymphocytic leukemia CR1 , ER1 , CR2 , ER2 , CR3 NonHodgkin 's lymphoma Hodgkin 's lymphoma Multiple myeloma 12 month prior alkylator base chemotherapy Myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) Acute leukemia arise MDS Primary resistant acute leukemia Chronic myelomonocytic leukemia Aplastic anemia ( 40 year age ) Solid tumor malignancy ( germ cell , sarcoma , breast , etc . ) Genetic disorder inborn error metabolism define preparative regimen protocol Chronic myelogenous leukemia Must meet inclusion criterion specify respective preparative regimen protocol No aplastic anemia 40 year age myelofibrosis PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 0.5 65 Performance status : Not specify Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : Not specify Renal : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : No prior red blood cell platelet transfusion sibling donor Chemotherapy : Not specify Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : Not specify Surgery : Not specify
